body.p: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, attorney. Pennsylvania native. Married to Sarah Hazen. Father of George W. Hazen, Mary J. Hazen, William P. Hazen. Attorney in Pittsburgh in 1860. Member of the Democratic Party. Secretary of the executive committee of the Allegheny County Democratic Party in 1863.
